name: HackZurich 2023
description: We created BraveGuard: an AI-powered app to improve a customer's interactions with their insurance company.

name: GreatUniHack 2022
description: We created JustPhish: a game to demonstrate how powerful AI can be in creating misinformation.

name: HackZurich 2022
description: We created Alturit: an app to help people volunteer translations and captions in their downtime.

name: GreatUniHack 2021
description: We created Pokemon Sanctuary: a game in which you catch Pokemon in a dangerous, post-apocalyptic world.
collaborators: Dan Bryan-Smith, Georgia Cawley, Issie Shaw & Lucy Jefford
